attributes.action: The UK government must strongly condemn the recent massacre in Syria of 450 women and children by Al Qaeda Terrorists
attributes.additional_details:
The reports and videos showing brutal massacres of Kurds by foreign Western supported Al Qaeda groups are truly disturbing. Such a massacre on this scale must be condemned by the British government.

Such a massacre would be the worst in recent history and those that commited it and their sponsors must face the full weight of justice
